nodes.text: Horizon Base was an Imperial shipping port and refueling station located on a planet in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. In the year 3 BBY, the Spectres raided Horizon Base to steal fuel needed for Phoenix Cell's fleet. During the First Order/Resistance War, Resistance members Finn and Gannis Ducain traveled to Horizon Base on a mission for the Resistance. They were spotted by two stormtroopers who they defeated by dropping cargo crates on them.
